channel.title: Ancient sidebar
channel.description:
Hey you know when wielding "Ancient Staff"? And you click the two swords to choose what combat style you want to train, well there is a book for autocasting.. Whats the case for that book?
Question 2: Whats the interface for the ancient magic autocast?
Thanks.

item.title: Ancient sidebar
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

[quote=“Runeblade912, post:2, topic:227397”]I don’t know the case for the book. Give me a minute.

Normal Magics: p.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // Normal

Ancient Magiks: p.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // Ancient[/quote]

No, thats for ancient magicks, all of them, including teleports etc…

I only want the sidebar/interface for ancient magick autocasting…

Anyone else?

Read full topic

item.title: Ancient sidebar
item.dc:creator: @Runeblade912 Runeblade912
item.description:
@Runeblade912 wrote:

I don’t know the case for the book. Give me a minute.

Ancient Magiks: p.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // Ancient
